thread.title: Larry L Stone
thread.title_full: willisorchards.com reviewed by Larry L Stone

author: Larry L Stone
title: Larry L Stone
text:
I received two large and healthy grape plants with long and healthy roots. I am very satisfied with Willis Orchards in every respect.
Unfortunately I was on the way out of town when I received a FedEx notice that the plants would arrive the next day, a Friday. I was unable to receive the plants until noon Monday. They had been stored at 70` but when I opened the packet for planting there was still crushed ice surrounding the roots. Impressive.
I could have wished a 10-14 day notice of impending shipment so that perhaps one of us could have amended our schedule by a few days. I understand the difficulties of that.
I will definitely order from Willis Orchard again.
